name: E3 Rush
description:
INTRO

Shortly before E3, calamity!

The Giant Bomb crew have all missed their flights, the GameSpot truck carrying their equipment has disappeared and time is running out. Our heroes must pile into an absurdly cramped van with as much gear as they can muster and race to E3 before the presentations start.

HOW TO PLAY

← → MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT ↑ SPEED UP ↓ SLOW DOWN
